Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Discover how the Action1 Platform integrates with Intune to simplify patch management. Gain real-time visibility into patch status and software inventory, automate third-party application updates, and apply risk-based remediation. With scalable, secure capabilities and no VPN required, Action1 streamlines patching without added complexity or blind spots.
